summary: A/C CONDENSER FAILURE. REPAIR PART IS ON NATIONAL BACKORDER. ESTIMATED ARRIVAL TIME IS 10-12 WEEKS.     TEXAS SUMMERS CREATE A VERY HOT VEHICLE. CHILDREN IN CAR SEATS WITHOUT AIR CONDITIONING IS DANGEROUS WHEN SITTING IN BUMPER TO BUMPER TRAFFIC. RAINFALL REQUIRES EITHER THE WINDOWS GET ROLLED UP OR CHILDREN GET PELTED WITH RAIN DROPS ON THE HIGHWAY. NEITHER ARE ACCEPTABLE.
